meeting_info.location: Council Chambers, 6th Floor, City Hall, Dallas, Texas

agenda_items.description: Approval of the minutes from the previous meeting.

agenda_items.description: Update on the strategies and effectiveness of the violent crime reduction plan.

agenda_items.description: Update on the operations and effectiveness of the Sobering Center.

agenda_items.title: Public Safety Dashboards
agenda_items.description: Presentation on the public safety dashboards.

agenda_items.description: Update on the review of non-adjudicated cases in municipal court.

agenda_items.description: Update on the Violence Intervention Program.

agenda_items.description: Authorize amendment to the contract with Dallas College for instructional services for police academy training.

agenda_items.title: May 22, 2024 City Council DRAFT Agenda Item 24-1492
agenda_items.description: Authorize a three-year service contract for maintenance, support, and licenses for an audio and video recording system for the Dallas Police Department.
